name: Titanic Knurl
desc: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack) .
notes:
The Titanic Knurl is a boss item in Risk of Rain 2, dropped by the   Stone Titan.
The holder gains a flat +40 maximum HP (+40 HP per stack), and their natural health regeneration is increased by +1.6 HP/s (+1.6 HP/s per stack). Additionally, this regeneration bonus increases by 20% per player level, or 0.32 HP/s per level, per stack.


== Notes ==
The regeneration provided by the Titanic Knurl benefits from the  Rejuvenation Rack.
As with other healing items which increase base health regeneration, picking up a Titanic Knurl does not inhibit the completion of the Naturopath challenge.

== Trivia ==
The Titanic Knurl is the successor to the Colossal Knurl from Risk of Rain 1 item. The Colossal Knurl drops from the Stone Titan's predecessor, the Colossus, and increases the holder's health, health regeneration, and armor.
During Early Access, prior to the introduction of the  Halcyon Seed, the Titanic Knurl would drop as a reward for defeating   Aurelionite in the Gilded Coast.
